title: Smart Data Models - Location
description: Adapted from CIM data models. The place, scene, or point of something where someone or something has been, is, and/or will be at a given moment in time. It can be defined with one or more postition points (coordinates) in a given coordinate system.

type.description: Property. NGSI type. It has to be Location

CoordinateSystem.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Coordinate system used to describe position points of this location. Default: None

PositionPoints.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Sequence of position points describing this location, expressed in coordinate system `Location.CoordinateSystem`. Default: 'list'

PowerSystemResources.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. All power system resources at this location. Default: None
